name: Crusoe's Squeaky Ball Pop
description:
Crusoe, who is an adorable little wiener dog, accidentally causes his squeaky ball factory to EXPLODE when he cranks up the output - sending himself, his puppy siblings Daphne and Oakley, as well as his squirrel workers and all the squeaky balls - flying across the globe!

Now it's up to you to POP squeaky balls, save the squirrels, and find your friends as you adventure across beautiful landscapes in this FREE and FUN puzzle game!

Plus, if you're a fan of Crusoe already, you've probably seen his many costumes and outfits! So, unlock funny new character outfits as you progress, such as 'Captain Crusoe', or 'Dog Ross the Painter!'. You'll even be able to play as his sister Daphne or brother Oakley!

And it's not JUST for dachshund lovers! As you play through these cute and fun levels, more of Crusoe's friends, such as his buddy Dillon the golden retriever and his girlfriend Paisley, will give you special boosts when the going gets tough.

FEATURES
• Simple and satisfying puzzle gameplay! Pop squeaky balls to save squirrels and beat levels!
• Follow the adorable storyline of Crusoe traveling across unique landscapes to find his friends Oakley and Daphne.
• Enjoy hundreds of bright, cute, and challenging levels!
• Collect coins (buttons), and blast balls with special boosters and power up characters!
• Sport your wardrobe with new character outfits and costumes!

Play, enjoy, and let us know how you love Crusoe's Squeaky Ball POP!
